description: Detects when a single rules or all of the rules have been deleted from the Windows Defender Firewall
author: frack113
name: A Rule Has Been Deleted From The Windows Firewall Exception List
query: ((winlog.event_id:(2006 OR 2052) AND (NOT ((ModifyingApplication:(/[Cc]\:\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\ \([Xx]86\)\\\\.*/)) OR (ModifyingApplication:/[Cc]\:\\\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\\\[Ss][Vv][Cc][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR (NOT _exists_:ModifyingApplication) OR (ModifyingApplication:)))) AND (NOT (ModifyingApplication:/[Cc]\:\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\ [Dd][Ee][Ff][Ee][Nn][Dd][Ee][Rr]\\\\[Pp][Ll][Aa][Tt][Ff][Oo][Rr][Mm]\\\\.*/ AND ModifyingApplication:/.*\\\\[Mm][Ss][Mm][Pp][Ee][Nn][Gg]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)))
